uvot_photometry module¶

Use UVOTSOURCE to get aperture photometry from UVOT images.

class uvot_photometry.MeasureSource(filepath='', default_fs=True)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class to measure photometry on UVOT data using the UVOTSOURCE tool and to parse the results.

filepath¶

str – path of fits image to input into UVOTSOURCE

source_coords¶

astropy.coordinates.SkyCoord – coordinates of the source

dirpath¶

str – directory containing filepath

obs¶

str – observation ID parsed from filepath

band¶

str – observation band parsed from filepath

correct_extinction(val, filtr, EBminV=None, mag=False)[source]¶

Function to correct for Galactic extinction using values from IRSA

Note

Central wavelengths for UVOT filters are taken from Poole et al. (2008). \(R_{\lambda}\) values are derived using the York Extinction Solver.

Parameters:
  • val (float) – flux or mag requiring extinction correction (flux is assumed, unless mag = True)
  • filtr (str) – UVOT filter name (vv, uu, bb, w1, m2, w2)
  • source_coords (astropy.coordinates.SkyCoord) – Source position to be used for querying the amount of extinction
Returns:

Extinction-corrected flux (erg/s/cm2) or magnitude (mag)
Return type:

float
get_observation_data()[source]¶

Parse the output of UVOTSOURCE to extract essential photometry information.

Returns:observing band, observing time (MJD), magnitude and 1$sigma$ error in UVOT system, flux and 1$sigma$ error in erg/s/cm$^{2}$/$AA$, flux and 1$sigma$ error in milliJanskies
Return type:list
get_observation_time()[source]¶

Uses the header of the image corresponding to filepath to get the start and end time of the observation.

Returns:the middle of the observation time in ISOt format
Return type:float
run_uvotsource()[source]¶

Wrapper to run the UVOTSOURCE tool for extracting photometry. The input/output file information is taken from the class attributes, which are obtained by parsing the provided filepath argument.

Warning

Running this will override previously generated output files with the same names.

Returns:2 elements corresponding to the output and error messages from UVOTSOURCE
Return type:list
